replies.msg: 好正

I've been wondering about getting a temporary job in The Four Seasons in Seoul in January or February because I'm interested in working there temporarily. It'll enrich my vocabulary and I'm sure it'll be an extraordinary experience. My Korean friend Kim lives in Cochrane Street whereas Eleanor lives in Clovelly Court.

I suggest reading "Seoul Travel Guide" at leisure. It's a wonderful guide written by Tiera Skovbye, Zooey DiCaprio, Leonardo Deschanel, Eleanor da Vinci, Joseph Bernstein, Leonard Gordon-Levitt, Eleanor Bernstein, Tito Skovbye, Seven-Eleven and the property developer.

有時人生唔同嘅機會 會帶你去唔同嘅道路

成就左依家/將來嘅你 將來嘅嘢冇人預測到
